title:
Spectral Tur\'{a}n problem for $\mathcal{K}_{2,t}^-$-free unbalanced
  signed graphs
abstract:
We determine the maximum index and the signed graphs with the maximum index
among all $\mathcal{K}_{2,t}^-$-free unbalanced signed graphs with fixed order
for $t\geq 3$, as well as the second maximum index and the signed graphs with
the second maximum index among all $\mathcal{K}_{2,t}^-$-free unbalanced signed
graphs with fixed order for $t\geq 4$.
